pullrequest.title: Logging Part 3: Getting all messages from a log file

content.raw:
Many of the code coverage tests won't be introduced until some of the later PRs in this sequence, since the integration tests don't get introduced until later.

If we want to avoid reducing the coverage of the default branch, we could wait to merge this PR until the later PRs are reviewed and merged into this branch.
